title: Champ Select Freezing
body:
This was happening 2 weeks ago and its happening again

I accept queue and enter champ select, and champ select freezes causing me to dodge and lose LP.
Checked my ping during the Freeze and it was normal with no packet loss.

Fix your servers

replies.body:
I'm not even using the Beta Client, at first I thought that was the issue so I stopped using it when it released. When I reported this I was using the regular client, that day there was issues with chat, where I would log in and chat wasn't working, so I had to relog and hope it did.

This occurred on the same day when the stuck in log in bug happened.

Are you running the Beta Client on a low-spec computer? We've seen some performance issues for players that are running League on a lower end machine with the Beta Client. If you aren't using the Beta Client, please let me know.
